mapper.select:
select u.*, o.org_name from t_sys_user as u left join t_sys_org as o on u.org_id = o.org_id where u.sts = '1' and o.org_sts = '1'
and (o.org_id = #{dto.orgId} or find_in_set(#{dto.orgId}, o.org_ancestors))
and u.user_name like concat('%', #{dto.userName},'%')
and u.user_mobile like concat('%', #{dto.userMobile},'%')
and u.nick_name like concat('%', #{dto.nickName} ,'%')
and u.status = #{dto.status}
and u.create_time between #{dto.createTimeRange[0]} and #{dto.createTimeRange[1]}
